mapper.select: select lunchboxseq, name, category, price, pic, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as regdate, to_char(modidate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as modidate from tbllunchbox order by lunchboxseq desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbllunchbox (lunchboxseq, name, category, price, pic, regdate, modidate) values (lunchboxseq.nextVal, #{name}, #{category}, #{price}, #{pic}, default, default)
mapper.update: update tbllunchbox set name = #{name}, category = #{category}, price = #{price}, pic = #{pic}, modidate = default where lunchboxseq = #{lunchboxseq}
